question: The recently launched "Quality Mark" Award Scheme is an initiative under which ministry?
option1: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
option2: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
option3: Ministry of Water Resources, River Development and Ganga Rejuvenation
answer: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
explanation: The "Quality Mark" Award Scheme is an initiative by the National Dairy Development Board (NDDB) under the Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare. It aims to promote and encourage enhancement of safety, quality and hygiene of milk and milk products manufactured by dairy cooperatives.
